why choose us

A winery with a heart

Natural Farmed

Traditional Recipes

Delicious Taste

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim

Discover the process “A homey little winery and vineyard right here. Delicious wines, nice variety, knowledgeable and friendly staff. Beautiful environment for wine tasting – laid back, chairs outside to slowly enjoy your tasting, no rush, and ample samples.” Joe R. New York "I like wine more and more each day because it makes my life a lot easier. Man, this thing is getting better and better as I learn more about it. Wine is the next killer app. Nice work on your wine. We've used wine for the last five years. Wine is exactly Deanne D. New York

shop now
